title: "Dashboard!!"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")
rest_inspec =
  rest_inspec %>% 
  select(
    boro, cuisine_description, inspection_date, inspection_type,
    score, violation_code, violation_description
  ) %>% 
  filter(
    boro == "MANHATTAN",
    inspection_type == "Cycle Inspection / Initial Inspection"
  )
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r rest type's score distribution}
rest_inspec |>
  drop_na(violation_code) |>
  mutate(cuisine_description = fct_reorder(cuisine_description, score)) |>
  plot_ly(
    x = ~cuisine_description, y = ~score, color = ~cuisine_description,
    type = "box", colors = "viridis")
```

### Chart C

```{r rest_type frequency}
rest_inspec |> 
  count(cuisine_description) |> 
  mutate(cuisine_description = fct_reorder(cuisine_description, n)) |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~cuisine_description, y = ~n, 
    type = "bar")
```
